channel.title: We Talk Nerd Podcast
channel.description: Tune in as Brandon, Jared and Andrew talk about current nerd culture. Every week we dive into subjects like games, movies, tv and more!

item.title: We Talk Nerd Podcast Episode 1
item.description: Episode 1 of the We Talk Nerd Podcast is out! Tune into Brandon, Jared and Andrew as they talk about current nerd culture. Every week we dive into subjects like games, movies, tv and news!
